QuestData.Title: Sanctum Upgrade: Command Table
QuestData.Description:
We got a Scroll of Dark Empowerment ready for youz that should manifest a command table for you. Not just any command table, but one of 'em magic ones that lets you issue orders from afar.
Tactician Sakaa insisted she be your wing for that one. Never much trusted 'em wings as they ain't too kind to us dredgers but put 'em in charge of war and even Maldraxxus flinches.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Scroll of Dark Empowerment to conjure a Command Table.
QuestData.RewardText: We have much to accomplish, and as resourceful as you are, you are not able to be in all places at once.
